title: FFF-Class Building Owner - Novel Updates
tags: Bullying   Dungeons   Level System   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Store Owner
author: Ki Won-Woo   글 켠우
description:
Having managed to raise money in a desperate manner, Joo Min-Seong applied for the first time in six years to be awakened. The life of a man of ability that he had dreamed of. That life was just around the corner.

A rosy future seemed to be in sight.
The problem was the moment he opened the envelope.

For the first time in Korea and the first in the world, an FFF-class person has appeared.

-What kind of abilities has he awakened to?
-Well, he has the ability to be a building owner.
-Building owner? Is that the building owner I know? That’s his ability?
-Pfft! Yes! The details are unknown, but wouldn’t it hurt the person more if we analyzed their abilities?

The broadcast was aired all over the world simultaneously. Joo Min-Seong quickly became the laughingstock of the world.

On that day, small flames of revenge bloomed in Joo Min-Seong’s heart.

‘Even if it’s crawling, I will get my revenge.’

===
[FFF-class building owner capability is now linked.]
[The connection is complete.]
===>
